name: Pandaros.API
about: Pandaros' API adds a slew of API features that the settlers mod is built upon, Comes with Colony management/job assignment and Player Magic items tool!

notes: GREATLY expanded extentions, allowing other mod makers to use the settlers systems and adding to them

Things that can be extended: Bosses, Armor, Weapons, Magic Items, Recipes, Texture Mapping, Multi-Tier Science, Help Menu, Roaming Job, Ore Generation, Connected Blocks, Monsters, Machines, Magical Blocks
